title: Las Vegas
creator_credit: United Airlines, Film and Television Communications and Vern Barry
brief_description: Las Vegas, Nevada, as seen through the eyes of a “go-go” girl. During the daytime various kinds of sports are seen, whilst at night the entertainment city comes to life with activities in casinos, at stage shows and restaurants. No dialogue - music only.
creator_credit_for_label: United Airlines, Film and Television Communications and Vern Barry
